headline: KURODA ASPHERICAL GRINDING SYSTEM
description: Aspherical Grinding System    Simultaneous Control of the X,Y and Z axis.
categories.lvl2: Surface Processing Equipment  >  Lapping Machines > Single Sided Lapper
specstable:
Manufacturer Kuroda Precisio
Model SPG-30
Description Aspherical Grinding System
Plate Speed 16 RPM
Plate Drive 2.50 HP
Wafer Size Range
Maximum 75 mm
Slurry Tank Capacity 2.35 L (0.62 gal, 0.52 Br gal)
Accessories Optional equipment not included with system
Noritake Diamond Wheels
  • Size: 180mm Dia x 20mm T x 50mm H
  • P/N: 247623, 247622, 247624, 282133, 2821991, 995106, 282133
    Fanuc A6 Series AC Motors--NEW
  • P/N: A06B-0127-B077/02320--Qty 1
  • P/N: A06B-0127-B177--Qty 1
Other Information Specifications:
Workpiece material: Glass
Max substrate: 300mm
X Axis Specifications:
  • Stroke: 300mm
  • Straightness: 4µm/300mm
  • Feed rate: 1-1000mm/min
  • Least input increment: 0.1µm
  • Control: Totally closed loop by linear scale
    Y Axis Specifications:
  • Stroke: 300mm
  • Straightness: 4µm/300mm
  • Feed rate: 1-1000mm/min
  • Least input increment: 0.1µm
  • Control: Totally closed loop by linear scale
    Z Axis Specifications:
  • Stroke: 120mm
  • Straightness: 4µm/120mm
  • Feed rate: 1-1000mm/min
  • Least input increment: 0.1µm
  • Control: Totally closed loop by linear scale
    Spindle Specifications:
  • Speed: 500-3600rpm, infinitely variable.
  • Spindle motor: 1.5kW, AC200V
  • Grinding wheel: Metal bonded diamond
  • Gridnding wheel size: ø180mm x ø50.8mm x t20mm
    Control Specifications
  • FANUC 16M NC control unit
  • Automatic operation is performed by PC data
    NB: For more detailed information please open the "extended description" link above.
Extended Description Details at Kuroda SPG-30.pdf
Power Requirements 200-208 V 60.0 A 50/60 Hz 3 Phase
Year of Manufacture 2000
Exterior Dimensions
Width 98.425 in (250.0 cm)
Depth 98.425 in (250.0 cm)
Height 92.520 in (235.0 cm)
Weight 8,818 lb (4,000 kg)
